description: GLPI is a powerful open-source IT Asset Management, IT Service Management and helpdesk solution. Manage your IT infrastructure, track assets, handle tickets and incidents with comprehensive ITIL workflows.

## ğŸ”— LDAP Integration

If LDAP is enabled, users are automatically synchronized on first startup. You can log in with your Cloudron credentials.

## ğŸ“‚ Persistent Data

All data is stored in `/app/data` and backed up automatically:
- Configuration: `/app/data/config`
- Files & logs: `/app/data/files`
- Plugins: `/app/data/plugins`
- Marketplace: `/app/data/marketplace`

## ğŸ”§ Troubleshooting

To reinitialize GLPI (e.g., after database corruption):
```bash
cloudron exec rm -f /app/data/config/config_db.php
cloudron restart
```

The app will automatically reinitialize on next startup.
